author: Gino D'Acampo
method: Soak all the fruit in the amaretto for at least 1 hour. Serve the fruit in a glass and spoon over a bit of the amaretto used to marinate the fruit in. Garnish with a sprig of mint.
ingredients: 5 tbsp amaretto liquor,  200g/7oz strawberries, halved,  200g/7oz blueberries,  200g/7oz melon, cubed,  mint, to garnish (optional)
